uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.logging.log4j

Class Log4JLoggerService

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.logging.log4j.Log4JLoggerService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AppContextCleanup, AppContextService<LoggerService>, ConfigServiceListener, Contexed, LoggerService

    public class Log4JLoggerService
extends java.lang.Object
implements LoggerService, Contexed, ConfigServiceListener
    LoggerService that uses Log4J The first time the service is made it will configure loggers using the properties from the ConfigService
    Author:
    spb
